complex.title: Line Chart Tour
complex.text: Before we show you the line chart, we will first guide you through the main components of the visualization.

complex.title: Line Chart Visualization
complex.text:
This is the main visualizations.
Your turn: Hover over the lines to see details.

complex.title: This is a time filter!
complex.text:
You can use this filter to brush and select a subset of weeks. Only the data of the selected weeks will be shown in the visualization.
Your turn: Try creating a filter by clicking and dragging over a set of weeks.

complex.title: This is a time filter!
complex.text: Your turn: Now try moving the filter you have created.

complex.title: This is a time filter!
complex.text: Your turn: Now, click on the time filter outside of the selection you created to clear the filter.

complex.title: This is the legend.
complex.text: The legend explains you which color represents which parts of the data
